solution_line_template: Wraps add {raw_squat}*{wraps_percent}=<<{raw_squat}*{wraps_percent}={wraps_added}>>{wraps_added} pounds to his lift
So they add {wraps_added}-{sleeves_added}=<<{wraps_added}-{sleeves_added}={more_pounds_wraps_than_sleeves}>>{more_pounds_wraps_than_sleeves} pounds more than sleeves
